extendedInfo.description: Milling Speed & Feed Calculator is a multiple value calculator tool to determine the various calculations using desired tool diameter, number of teeth, cutting speed and cutting feed which are chosen based on the cutting condition.It calculates Feed Rate, Spindle Speed for a milling operation, cutting feed as well as the Cut Time for a given cut length. Functionalities:â¢	Spindle speed (RPM)â¢	Feed rate (IPM)â¢	Cutting feed (IPR)â¢	Cut time (min)Features:â¢	A very light weighted.â¢	A very User friendly Interface. Easy to understand the inputs.â¢	All the calculations are done at an eye blink time. Very Speedy Calculator.â¢	All the calculations are very simultaneous. If any of the parameter used in the calculation changes, the new result is calculated on the spot.â¢	A Help Menu. Each difficult concepts are well explained in an easy and diagrammatically way.        While using our application if you are facing any issue then you can contact us so we can fix that issue as soon as possible.You can also contact us for any new features which you are looking into your app. We create app as per your requirements.Please contact us at inquiry@capacitywebsolutions.comCheckout Our Website :- http://www.capacitywebsolutions.com/
